mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations (order_no, slot_no, user_no, content, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{orderNo}, #{slotNo}, #{userNo}, #{content}, 'REQUESTED', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.no, r.order_no AS orderNo, r.user_no AS userNo, u.name AS userName, r.slot_no AS slotNo, w.slot_date AS slotDate, w.slot_time AS slotTime, r.status AS status, r.content AS content, w.amount AS amount FROM reservations r JOIN client u ON r.user_no = u.no JOIN weekly_time_slots w ON r.slot_no = w.no WHERE r.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY w.slot_date DESC
